useCase.name: View Digitization Date of Archive Item

preconditions.precondition: The Researcher accesses the digital archive through the Web Interface.

successEndConditions.condition: The Web Interface successfully displays the item details including the digitization date.

useCase.trigger: Researcher requests to view the digitization date of an archive item.

mainSequence.step: Researcher accesses the digital archive through the Web Interface.
Web Interface requests to view the item details.
Search Service queries the item metadata in the Archive Database.
Archive Database returns metadata including the digitization date.
Search Service displays the item details.
Web Interface shows item details including the digitization date to the Researcher.
